text: Hagi ananknafina vene omase mofa'nemo'za musenkase hu'za avo nehagesage'za, nahezavemo'zane ranra vahe'mo'zanena ana zanke hu'za avo hagegahaze. Na'ankure zamasunku zampima mani'naza zana eri atresuge'za musenkase hugahaze. Nagra zamagu'a zamazeri hankaveneti'na zamasunku zana eri netre'na museza zamigahue.
